Generation V.Black: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
Generation V.White: They pretend to be elaborate coffins to teach lessons to grave robbers. Their bodies are covered in pure gold.
Generation V.Black 2: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.
Generation V.White 2: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

Generation VI.X: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
Generation VI.Y: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon has a body of sparkling gold. People say it no longer remembers that it was once human.
Generation VIII.Shield: There are many depictions of Cofagrigus decorating ancient tombs. They're symbols of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Mirage Caves (north of Route 124 , south of Route 131 )
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Mirage Caves (north of Route 124 , south of Route 131 )
